nodes.text: Cooper's Swoopers were a swoop gang operating on Bescane in the town of Lumchugger's Hub. They were led by the Rebel sympathizer, Cooper Dray. During Operation Death-Hunter, they became involved with a Rebel SpecOps group that was investigating a secret Imperial project. When Cooper was captured by the Empire, the swoop gang aided the Rebels in trying to track down their leader.
